name: reYal
description:
A short puzzle game where you
play as you playing as you
to find out why.

Too experimental for more spoilers. I think you'll like the ending if you can find it.Features+ Rooms/Layers

+ Buttons
+ Doors and Keys
+ ImplicationsAccessibility+ No dialog
- No subtitles
+ No color differentiation required
+ Mostly high contrast
+ No time limits to complete in-game tasks
+ Simple menu
- No instructions
- No alternative difficulty levels
- Only partial non-remappable controller support (Requires if used: 1 d-pad, 1 button)
- No remappable keyboard keys (Requires: wasd or arrow keys, enter or space or e, escape)
